statements: SELECT report_title, report_date FROM AdHocReports;
SELECT report_content, report_date FROM AdHocReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdHocReports WHERE generated_by_user = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_title, report_content FROM AdHocReports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT generated_by_user, report_date, report_content FROM AdHocReports ORDER BY report_date ASC, generated_by_user DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdHocReports WHERE report_id = '12345';
SELECT report_title, report_content FROM AdHocReports WHERE generated_by_user = 'John Smith';
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_date FROM AdHocReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AdHocReports WHERE report_title LIKE '%Sales%';
SELECT report_title, generated_by_user FROM AdHocReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM strategic_decision_making ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%monthly%';
SELECT decision_id, decision_name, decision_description FROM strategic_decision_making WHERE decision_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9abc-9876543210ab';
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND report_name LIKE '%financial%';
SELECT * FROM strategic_decision_making WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT decision_name, decision_description FROM strategic_decision_making WHERE decision_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' AND decision_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE date_requested >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM report_users WHERE user_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT report_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM ad_hoc_reports JOIN report_metrics ON ad_hoc_reports.report_id = report_metrics.report_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM report_users WHERE report_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT user_name FROM report_users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT report_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM ad_hoc_reports JOIN report_metrics ON ad_hoc_reports.report_id = report_metrics.report_id;
SELECT report_name, user_name, user_email FROM ad_hoc_reports JOIN report_users ON ad_hoc_reports.report_id = report_users.report_id WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_content FROM ad_hoc_reports;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_role FROM users ORDER BY user_role DESC;
SELECT decision_name, decision_description FROM decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM ad_hoc_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT u.user_name, a.access_date, r.report_name FROM users u JOIN report_access a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN ad_hoc_reports r ON a.report_id = r.report_id;
SELECT d.decision_name, d.decision_date, r.report_name FROM decisions d JOIN ad_hoc_reports r ON d.decision_date = r.report_date;
SELECT DISTINCT user_role FROM users;
SELECT * FROM AdHocReports;
SELECT report_name, creation_date FROM AdHocReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_content FROM AdHocReports WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ReportAuthors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT report_id, views, downloads FROM ReportStatistics WHERE downloads > views;
SELECT * FROM AdHocReports ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_name, report_content FROM AdHocReports WHERE report_id = 5
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM ReportAuthors ORDER BY author_name ASC
SELECT report_name, views, downloads FROM AdHocReports JOIN ReportStatistics ON AdHocReports.report_id = ReportStatistics.report_id
SELECT category_name, COUNT(report_id) FROM ReportCategories JOIN AdHocReports ON ReportCategories.category_id = AdHocReports.report_id GROUP BY category_name
